page.title: 02Life in the Past-Home Visit
page.content:
We were very lucky to be able to visit the home of the mother of one of the teachers in our school.We all went into her living room.Then we started to ask our questions.We knew that the answers she would give us would be different to the ones we would give as Mrs.Williams is over Eighty Years Old!
{Did you have hot water? No we had to boil it by the side of the fire.
{Did you used to have milk in a bottle? We used to take a measuring jug to the door and a milkman with a horse and cart used to fill it.
{Where did you get married? I got married in Carmel Chapel.The chapel then was full every Sunday. {It was an interesting visit!}
